channel.title: Just an idea, not sure where to post
channel.description:
Right well, I'm not 100% sure if this should be posted here, but I'm sure someone can move it. o.o
Well my little idea, or dream, whatever it should be called Is:
Would it be possible or easy to run a runescape private server with a Navicat database. It would serve as easier editing (after all files were converted) But seeing as I'm brand new to making rs pservers. I've got no idea how everything is going about running itself (seeing as i found this website last night)...
It doesen't -seem- hard to do. But it would be very time consuming but in the long run saving time.
I dunno, this is just a thought, not that I would dare to attempt it O.o
Thanks for reading! ~Rosie
